account.ads_notifications_description: Get notified about the status of your ads, including approvals and rejections.
account.messages_notifications_description: Get notified whenever you receive a new message.
account.profile_info_description: Profile information that you can change at any time.
account.profile_picture_description: This image will be displayed publicly as your profile picture and will help site visitors identify you.
account.personal_info_description: Your personal information will only be visible to the Akarcom team and will be used solely for communication purposes.
account.business_info_description: Your business profile will be visible to all Akarcom users and external visitors.

upgrade.title: Create Free Business account
upgrade.description: Upgrade your personal account to a professional real estate agency or developer account. Unlock advanced tools, showcase your business with a dedicated page, and attract more clients.
upgrade.dialog_description: Choose between 2 types of business accounts , real estate agency or developer

duplicate_email.description: The email address you entered is already in use. Please use a different email or update the existing user.

duplicate_phone_number.description: The phone number you entered is already associated with another account. Please provide a unique phone number.

ads.ads_description: Create, update, and organize your real estate listings.

create.ad_title_description: Enter a short, catchy title that highlights the main features of your property.
create.ad_desc_description: Please write a sufficient description to explain the property and all its details.
create.ad_desc_placeholder: Spacious 3-bedroom apartment with a sea view, modern kitchen, and nearby public transport.
create.property_type_description: Please select the property type from the following list.
create.ad_type_description: Please select the type of transaction from the following options (Sale or rent).
create.num_rooms_description: Please enter the number of rooms
create.bethrooms_description: Please enter the number of bathrooms inside the property.
create.schools_description: Please enter the number of nearby schools.
create.mosques_description: Please enter the number of nearby mosques.
create.property_tags_description: Please write keywords that describe the property
create.location_description: You can specify the location and enter virtual visit information, if available.
create.property_images_description: You can add all the images & videos of the property .
create.price_description: Enter the sale or rent price
create.condition_description: Please select the property condition from the following list.
create.virtual_visit_placeholder: Drag and drop the .zip file of the virtual visit

errors.description_invalid: Description must be a valid text

errors.longitude_invalid: Longitude must be a valid number
errors.area_invalid: Area (in m²) must be a valid number

errors.furnished_invalid: Furnished value must be true or false

errors.mosques_invalid: Mosques must be a valid number

errors.ownership_book_invalid: Ownership book must be a boolean
errors.property_images_required: At least one image is required
errors.property_tags_invalid: Property tags must be a valid array

success.title: Property Created
success.description: Your real estate property has been successfully created and is now available in your listings.

home.title: Akarcom website Your First Choice.
home.description: Explore thousands of properties listed for sale and rent, all within your reach, through a reliable and easy-to-use real estate platform.

failed_to_load.title: Failed to fetch properties
failed_to_load.description: An error occurred while loading properties. Please try again later.

features.title: Features & Benefits
features.card_title: The best way to find what you need!
features.card_description: You can find the right property among the thousands of options available on your property.

card_1.title: Interactive search
card_1.description: You can search directly on the map, giving you a comprehensive view of the properties in the area.

card_2.title: Virtual Tour
card_2.description: Akarkom offers you a unique experience to view properties directly with 360° virtual reality technology.

card_3.title: Quality Assurance
card_3.description: Akarkom property listings are reviewed before and after publishing, ensuring a safe browsing experience for premium properties.

card_4.title: Certified Agents
card_4.description: Akarkom provides optimal support for distinguished agents to ensure the perfect experience.
